方法详细信息

gettext

public static java.lang.String gettext(java.lang.String key)
Get the internationalized text, but return key if key is unknown.

参数：
key -
返回：
the internationalized text

gettext

public static java.lang.String gettext(java.lang.String key,
                                       java.lang.Object param)
Get the internationalized text, but return key if key is unknown. The text requires one parameter to be passed.

参数：
key -
param -
返回：
the formatted, internationalized text

gettext

public static java.lang.String gettext(java.lang.String key,
                                       java.lang.Object[] params)
Get the internationalized text, but return key if key is unknown. The text requires one parameter to be passed.

参数：
key -
params -
返回：
the formatted, internationalized text
